caption.p: Deleterious effects of the anti-COVID-19 strategy (RED) can impact the base of the Mediterranean diet pyramid. An increase in polyphenol uptake and substitution of meat with legume-derived proteins can help prevent chronic inflammation, and reduction of caloric intake may compensate for the reduction in physical activity. Alcohol consumption is discouraged for healthy people and is detrimental for patients, even in the absence of clinical symptoms.
